nodes.text: Nirame Sakute was a female Rodian that lived during the Galactic Civil War. She served the Smugglers' Alliance as a trainer. Nirame was often found at a cantina in the Trade Outpost on Dathomir.

During her time at the Trade Outpost on Dathomir, Sakute wore a military travel pack, a red leather trim shirt with black colored trim, a silver colored padded armor belt, a red decorative skirt, and black women's shoes.

Nirame Sakute was a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
